trans-unit.source: Represents the configuration section for sockets, IPv6, response headers, and service points.
This class cannot be inherited.
This class corresponds to the [\<settings\> Element (Network Settings)](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/settings-element-network-settings.md) configuration element.
This class provides programmatic access to information that can be stored in configuration files.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Configuration.ConnectionManagementSection"></xref> class.
Gets the configuration element that controls the settings used by an <xref href="System.Net.HttpListener"></xref> object.
An <xref href="System.Net.Configuration.HttpListenerElement"></xref> object.
The configuration element that controls the settings used by an <xref href="System.Net.HttpListener"></xref> object.
Gets the configuration element that controls the settings used by an <xref href="System.Net.HttpWebRequest"></xref> object.
A <xref href="System.Net.Configuration.HttpWebRequestElement"></xref> object.
The configuration element that controls the maximum response header length and other settings used by an <xref href="System.Net.HttpWebRequest"></xref> object.
Gets the configuration element that enables Internet Protocol version 6 (IPv6).
A <xref href="System.Net.Configuration.Ipv6Element"></xref>.
The configuration element that controls setting used by IPv6.
Gets the configuration element that controls whether network performance counters are enabled.
A <xref href="System.Net.Configuration.PerformanceCountersElement"></xref>.
The configuration element that controls setting used network performance counters.
Gets the configuration element that controls settings for connections to remote host computers.
The settings correspond to properties in the <xref:System.Net.ServicePointManager> class.
A <xref href="System.Net.Configuration.ServicePointManagerElement"></xref> object.
The configuration element that that controls setting used network performance counters for connections to remote host computers.
Gets the configuration element that controls settings for sockets.
A <xref href="System.Net.Configuration.SocketElement"></xref> object.
The configuration element that controls settings for sockets.
Gets the configuration element that controls the execution timeout and download timeout of Web proxy scripts.
A <xref href="System.Net.Configuration.WebProxyScriptElement"></xref> object.
The configuration element that controls settings for the execution timeout and download timeout used by the Web proxy scripts.
Gets the configuration element that controls the settings used by an <xref href="System.Net.WebUtility"></xref> object.
Returns <xref href="System.Net.Configuration.WebUtilityElement"></xref>.
The configuration element that controls the settings used by an <xref href="System.Net.WebUtility"></xref> object.
